Tag_youmay.description: the memory of Kassandra | an [[Hide and Seek | alternate]] use of the word

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Hybrid|Tainted One, Kassandra|you think you fight for Makedonia? We challenge you! Meet us at the Rhamphias Military Camp. The Order of Hunters|Order awaits you.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''Hide-and-Seek''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a note on the [[message board]] challenging her to a fight at the [[Rhamphias Military Camp]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra fought and slew all three [[Achaemenid Empire|Persian]] [[Soldier|guard]]s who had challenged her.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] – [[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
